About Us: We are the Code World, No Blanket lab---a software engineering research group in the Department of Computer Science at Virginia Tech ðŸ¦ƒ. Our research uses empirical, interdisciplinary, and automated methods to improve the behavior, productivity, decision-making of software engineers---we study software development and software developers.

More details about us and our research are available here. This group is led by Dr. Chris Brown.
